document_data.name: Raccoon
document_data.Description: Raccoons had dexterous hands and were known to be both good at swimming and climbing.
document_data.Behavior: Raccoons typically only attacked other creatures if they felt cornered or were rabid.

Sub-Species.Golden Hills Racoon: Racoons that lived on the [[plane]] known as [[Golden Hills]] were [[celestial creature]]s whose whiskers had a [[gold]]en hue.

Ecology.Habitats:
Raccoons were known to inhabit the woodlands of [[Cormanthyr]], as well as [[Cormyr]]'s the [[Farsea Marshes]] and [[Tun Marshes]].<ref> In [[west Faer√ªn]], they could be found in both the [[Eastern Heartlands|Eastern]] and [[Western Heartlands]].

In [[Anauroch]], they were known to be found in the [[Plain of Standing Stones]]<ref> and in the verdant valley of [[Aerithae's Rest]]. In the [[Dalelands]], they were known to be found in the [[Spiderhaunt Woods]].

In the [[Unapproachable East]], raccoons could be found in the [[Yuirwood]] and [[Ashenwood]].

Outside of the [[Prime Material plane]], raccoons inhabited the plane of [[Arborea]], and could be found in the areas around the [[Gilded Hall]], [[Fermata]], and [[Brightwater]].
Ecology.Relationships:
Some [[ranger]]s were known to have raccoons as [[animal companion]]s.

Raccoons were considered a [[favored animal]] manifestation of the deities [[Baervan Wildwanderer]], [[Brandobaris]], [[Eldath]], [[Erevan Ilesere]], [[Garl Glittergold]], [[Nephthys]], [[Sheela Peryroyl]], and [[Thoth]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|10-11, 13-14}}
Ecology.Usages: The pelts of these creatures generally sold for around 1 [[gold piece]].

document_data.Notable Raccoons: * [[Mita]], a raccoon [[familiar]] of the notorious [[wu jen]] [[No Ziar]].
